item.description:
Join us at the MFA for some art, music, good company, and dancing.  Cash bar with available Tapas and other gourmet type food.

This will probably be the last First Friday in the inside gallaries before moving to the outdoor courtyard.  The group has had a lot of fun doing this in the past so let's do it again. 

Let's meet by the tables near the bar so everyone will have a chance to meet.  No problem if this your first social fun event as this is a great place to meet some fun and sociable people.

There is also a Cézanne painting on loan to the museum throuh May so depending on interest we may take a little museum tour at about 9:00 to visit the Sidney and Esther Rabb Gallery. http://www.mfa.org/exhibitions/visiting-masterpieces

MFA First Fridays Friday, April 5, 2013, 6:00 pm - 9:30 pm

Admission $25.  Often Discount tickets can be found at your local library/or through other social fun members who also have a museum membership.  *If you have a membership that allows for guests please feel free to post in the event discussion.
The event has a max attendance of 400 people, and does sell out  so, get there before 7:15 or take your chances.

Open to visitors 21+. Valid ID with proof of age required for entry.

http://www.mfa.org/programs/special-event/mfa-first-fridays

This event will be hosted by several different meetup groups with over 100 people already signed up to attend.
item.how_to_find_us: Will have a meetup Sign on tables by the bar
item.name: First Friday at the Museum of Fine Arts (to dance and socialize)
